DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine extent Regenerative Peripheral Nerve Interface ( i.e . reinnervation partial muscle graft residual peripheral nerve ) enable generation high-performance motor control signal prosthetic limb , input sensory percept electrical stimulation .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Electromyographic Activity Patients With Upper Limb Amputations
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : For prosthetic control graft arm : Must previously undergone upper limb amputation Must otherwise healthy ( e.g . severe pain syndrome untreated mental health disorder ) Must American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Class I ( low surgical risk ) Must sufficient soft tissue quality support performance operative procedure Must NOT previously receive partial muscle graft surgery For neuroma graft arm : Must previously undergone upper limb amputation Must otherwise healthy ( e.g . severe pain syndrome untreated mental health disorder ) Must previously receive partial muscle graft surgery For ablebodied arm : Must NOT undergone upper limb amputation Must good health Exclusion criterion : For prosthetic control graft arm : Participants sustain severe crush avulsion injury substantial superficial deep scarring , may appropriate candidate inclusion study For ablebodied arm : Participants history nerve pain may appropriate candidate inclusion study
